attributes.action: Benefit changes The effects to the disabled
attributes.additional_details:
The new benefit changes have affected many disabled claimants by them loosing their benefits even though they are clearly not able to work, The medical through DWP is very unfair and does not show the true extent of these claimants disabilities, They don't have access to medical records and make there decision from a 30 min visit. this needs to be changed
I myself am one of these that have had my claim stopped even though i have severe back injury.

With your help perhaps we can get some vital changes made to this system.
